TextView.android:text: This app is designed to provide the ease to the people,where Sender can send/receive their items from city A to City B. Sender will able to make the requests and the reasonable request will be displayed to the travelers. Travelers will have very much amount of choices he could make for choosing the reasonable amount of money he can get. Reciever will have to wait until his/her item arrives.In the meantime,he/she can see the current location of the traveler,who is holding his/her item on the way for his/her satisfaction.

I,ahsaan Ansari developed this application with Fazal soomro.We recently graduated from Sukkur IBA University in the respected departement of computer science. We came so far on this road only under the supervision of Dr. Sajid khan,who is assisatnt professor at Sukkur IBA University.
